# R Example

```{r}
library(mlbench) # Glass data
library(kernlab) # ksvm function

data(Glass)
names(Glass)

## train a support vector machine
fit.svm <- ksvm(
  Type ~ .,
  data   = Glass,
  kernel = "rbfdot"           # Radial basis function kernal
  # C      = 5, # cost 
  # cross  = 3  # cross validatoin
)

fit.svm # view results
```
